Has anybody seen duplicates download (same url download more than 
once) in 1.4? I did a few crawls and they all have duplicates.

For example, one arc file that I know has the following url 
downloaded twice

http://www.fibersource.com/feb/tariff.htm

I ran arcreader on the archive, here is the output
======================
[woot@i01 bin]$ ./arcreader ../../arcs_140/ACC-20050818000157-00000-
i01.ba.accelovation.com.arc.gz |grep 
fibersource\.com\/feb\/tariff.htm |more
20050818000641 65.196.64.131 
http://www.fibersource.com/feb/tariff.htm text/html
 - WWJSEREOM3WYIFWFT2AWHJXXWT6M7RFD 8065452 8111 ACC-20050818000157-
00000-i01.ba.accelovation.com
20050818000642 65.196.64.131 
http://www.fibersource.com/feb/tariff.htm text/html
 - 7LBFJFTNW76KLKLBTEHVX7JNHUBDSX2U 8234838 8111 ACC-20050818000157-
00000-i01.ba.accelovation.com
[woot@i01 bin]$
=======================

clearly the url has been downloaded twice in this archive. Is it 
possible or am I missing something?

I did not encounter this problem in 1.0.4

-Joe
